desc: Ooh-Box is the place to come for hand-picked, stylish gift selections for busy individuals. We wanted to offer something different and we wanted to offer a really top notch service so we have brought together a selection of beautiful, co-ordinated items which are hand wrapped and packed in our crisp white packaging.

layout.text: ✔ Luxury Gift Wrapping Included in the Price
✔ Thoughtful Ready to Mail Gift Hampers
✔ Gifts for Her, for Him, for Baby and Gifts for all Occasions
✔ 60 Day No Hassle Money Back Guarantee
